message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I believe it's worth a lot to you. I'm willing to let it go for $14,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me halfway?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,500 is simply too low for me.  How about we split the difference? I'm willing to come down to $13,250. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13,250 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $12,750. Can you consider that?

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but $12,750 is still too far below my minimum.  I'm willing to make one final compromise, but I need to be at $13,000 to make this work. This is my absolute bottom line. If you're serious about buying the product, let me know. Otherwise, I'll be moving on to other offers.
